greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Second order complementary Bell numbers.
mathematica: CoefficientList[c, x] Range[0, nmax]! (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jul 12 2019, from PARI *)
program: complementary_bell_numbers = [sum((-1)^n*b for (n, b) in enumerate (bell_transform(n, uno))) for n in range(len)]
complementary_bell_numbers2 = [sum((-1)^n*b for (n, b) in enumerate (bell_transform(n, complementary_bell_numbers))) for n in range(len)]
\\ For n>28 precision has to be adapted as needed!
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Dec 03 2015
